channel.title: Dessert on My cookbook - Tiago Queiroz

item.title: Mug Cake
item.description: The goal is achieve something like in the photo, the centre is set, but the sides are still a bit runny. The flour should be well cooked (aka no flour taste). Dark chocolate chips will add creaminess and richness of flavour, white chocolate chips will add colour contrast and sweetness. If you’re like me and don’t like super sweet desserts, use 1 tbsp of dark chocolate chips and 1 tbsp of white chocolate chips.
